alert.note: Alert for Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 24 at 8:29AM CST until December 25 at 5:13PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville affecting Hunt County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cowleech Fork Sabine River at Greenville. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Caution should be exercised near the river as water begins to flow out of the banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Sunday the stage was 5.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 16.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
